text.section: A person required to register annually with the Department under this subtitle as a transporter of waste kitchen grease shall submit an application for registration in the form required by the Department.

Each application under this section shall be accompanied by:
A $100 application fee; and
A vehicle registration fee of $100 for each vehicle that the applicant will use to transport waste kitchen grease.
The registration required under this section shall be renewed annually on the payment of the fees required under subsection (c) of this section.
